page.title: List of Prime Ministers of Greece

revisions.rev:
[[File:Lucas Papademos.jpg|thumb|right|upright|[[Lucas Papademos]], the current Prime Minister of Greece since 11 November 2011]] {{Politics of Greece}} This is a list of the [[head of government|heads of government]] of the [[History of modern Greece|modern Greek state]], from its establishment during the [[Greek War of Independence|Greek Revolution]] to the present day. Although various official and semi-official appellations were used during the early decades of independent statehood, the title of '''[[Prime Minister of Greece|Prime Minister]]''' has been the formal designation of the office at least since 1843. Note that the numbering system in the list is arbitrary and has no official status. == Color key == {| class="wikitable" style="margin:0 portrait; width:600px;" |- ! colspan="6" style="width:180px;"|Legal status |- style="text-align:center;" | colspan="2" style="width:3px;; background:DarkKhaki;"|Military-led government | colspan="2" style="width:3px;; background:Lightgrey;"|Caretaker government | colspan="2" style="width:3px;; background:Tomato;"|Rival government
